title: The Forever
desc:
Post 2341
- This card ignore the Holy Color text that reads: "Only one <:holy:1120560132150022184> may spawn per game."
- This card follows the Legendary Rule. If a card is played with the Legendary Rule and it shares a name with another card that currently has an effect on the game, both cards are immediately removed from the game.
- **Whenever anybody draws a card for any reason, it has a 50% chance to be (2341) The Forever.**
- **The player of this card plays two turns whenever their turn starts.**
